# ModelContext.NotificationKey.queryGeneration

**Case**

A token that indicates which generation of the model store SwiftData is using.

## Declaration

```swift
case queryGeneration
```

## Accessing notification keys

- **ModelContext.NotificationKey.deletedIdentifiers**: A set of values identifying the context’s deleted models.
- **ModelContext.NotificationKey.insertedIdentifiers**: A set of values identifying the context’s inserted models.
- **ModelContext.NotificationKey.invalidatedAllIdentifiers**: A set of values identifying the context’s invalidated models.
- **ModelContext.NotificationKey.updatedIdentifiers**: A set of values identifying the context’s updated models.

items.description: A set of values identifying the context’s deleted models.
